thread.title: Small, clean, and great location
thread.title_full: Small, clean, and great location - Review of Hotel Crayon Rouge by Elegancia, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jlar01
title: Small, clean, and great location
text:
This boutique hotel has very small rooms - but who spends much time in the room in Paris? The staff was very friendly and the location was fantastic - just blocks from the Louvre and the metro. For the price, I would pick this small room with a great location again.
Room Tip: Be sure to look at the pictures if you need more space See more room tips
